name: Night Intruders
description:
A fairly fast paced , perma-deth, pixelart, 2d sidescroller.

  • Collect Stones, Wood, Metal and Parts
  • Place Traps all around to save you from a nightly Alien Invasion.
  • Throw stones at enemies of your traps fail.

CONTROLS: (Integrated Dan Mode)

  • A/Left Arrow = Walk Left
  • D/Right Arrow = Walk Right
  • S = Break Objects
  • W = Equip Stone Throwing
  • E = Cycle Traps
  • LMB/Space = Throw Stones/Place Trap
  • ESC = Pause Menu

Thanks for Playing......

Life is Short = Be Creative
